video_title: 7 Tools I Used To Build A Million-Dollar Business

content_profile.title: 7 Tools I Used To Build A Million-Dollar Business

key_takeaways: Solution: Use Answer The Public to find business ideas from search queries (Difficulty: beginner)
Solution: Monitor competitors systematically with tracking tools (Difficulty: beginner)
Growth Tactic: Create content around trending topics identified through Exploding Topics (Channel: content)
Growth Tactic: Engage in Reddit communities to provide solutions and build awareness (Channel: community)
Strategy: Build products that solve real community needs identified through research tools

startup_ideas.title: Project management software addressing current tool limitations
